criterion: Preferred price: 6000000 VND/month. Maximum budget: 550 USD/month (for exceptional options), not far from An Hải, not too far from the Han River (avoid Nguyễn Sinh Sắc and beyond), apartment or large studio. Key priorities: Spacious layout / open space, workplace — very important; Swimming pool preferred, gym would be cool but not at all essential; Kitchen with stove and cookware; Washing machine; Microwave; Reliable high-speed internet; Smart TV; Balcony; Moderate noise level; Время заезда как можно скорее
